cards.Name: Agustin Madrigal - Clumsy Dad
cards.Flavor_Text: Falling for Julieta was the easiest thing he'd ever done.

cards.Name: Alma Madrigal - Family Matriarch
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Let's be clear, Abuela runs this show."
-Mirabel
cards.Body_Text: To the Table - When you play this character, you may search your deck for a Madrigal character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

cards.Name: Ariel - Singing Mermaid
cards.Flavor_Text: "Watch and you'll see-some day I'll be part of your world!"
cards.Body_Text: Singer 7 (This character counts as cost 7 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Cinderella - Melody Weaver
cards.Body_Text:
Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.)
Beautiful Voice - Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1{l} this turn.

cards.Name: Cogsworth - Majordomo
cards.Flavor_Text: "If it's a fight they want, we'll be ready for them."
cards.Body_Text: As You Were! - Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character -2{s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Lovely Lady
cards.Flavor_Text:
Sweet Daisy, the fairest duck I ever met
Each flaxen lock a rush of flowing gold
Her bill the color of summer sunset
Exquisite plumes, a wonder to behold

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Musketeer Spy
cards.Flavor_Text: She has a talent for thwarting hidden schemes.
cards.Body_Text: Infiltration - When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Musketeer Soldier
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Wait For Me! - When you play this character, chosen character gets +1{l} this turn.

cards.Name: Felix Madrigal - Fun-Loving Family Man
cards.Flavor_Text: Who needs a gift when you're having this much fun?

cards.Name: Gaston - Despicable Dealer
cards.Flavor_Text: "Yes, yes, everything will be ready. Just make sure you do your part."
cards.Body_Text: Dubious Recruitment - {e}: You pay 2{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.Name: Golden Harp - Enchanter of the Land
cards.Flavor_Text: You'll miss her when she's gone.
cards.Body_Text: Stolen Away - At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a song this turn, banish this character

cards.Name: Goofy - Musketeer Swordsman
cards.Flavor_Text: "Count me in!"
cards.Body_Text: En Gawrsh! - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Julieta Madrigal - Excellent Cook
cards.Flavor_Text: "Eat this, mi amor."
cards.Body_Text: Signature Recipe - When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character. If you removed damage this way, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Max - Loyal Sheepdog
cards.Body_Text: Here Boy - If you have a character named Prince Eric in play, you play 1{i} less to play this character.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Leader of the Band
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Strike Up the Music - When you play this character, chosen character gains Support this turn.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer Captain
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Bodyguard, Support
Musketeers United - When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may draw a card for each character with Bodyguard you have in play.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Musketeer Champion
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Dramatic Entrance - When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 5{s} or more.

cards.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Gift of the Family
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Saving the Miracle - Whenever this character quests, your other Madrigal characters ger +1{l} this turn.

cards.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Prophecy Finder
cards.Flavor_Text: "Why would Bruno break this prophecy? Could it be something dangerous? We have to find out!"
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Pluto - Rescue Dog
cards.Flavor_Text: When you need help, his is the first face you want to see.
cards.Body_Text: To the Rescue - When you play this character, you may remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters.

cards.Name: Prince Eric - Seafaring Prince
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Prince Eric - Ursula's Groom
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Eric.)
Under Vanessa's Spell - While you have a character named Ursula in play, this character gains Bodyguard and gets +2{w}. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Stitch - Alien Dancer
cards.Flavor_Text: Moving to the music, he begins to understand the true meaning of ohana and how he fits into the family he has found.

cards.Name: Ursula - Eric's Bride
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a song card (You may discard a song card to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
Vanessa's Design - Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

cards.Name: Ursula - Vanessa
cards.Flavor_Text: This magic will certainly do the trick.
cards.Body_Text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Bruno's Return
cards.Flavor_Text: "I feel like I missed something important."
cards.Body_Text: Return a character card from your discard to your hand. Then remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: First Aid
cards.Flavor_Text: "There, now-isn't that better?"
cards.Body_Text: Remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters.

cards.Name: Look at this Family
cards.Body_Text:
Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 7 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 2 character cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Lost in the Woods
cards.Flavor_Text: I'm left behind, wondering if I should follow.
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
All opposing characters get -2{s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Sign the Scroll
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't, you gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Miracle Candle
cards.Body_Text: Abuela's Gift - Banish this item: If you have 3 or more characters in play, gain 2 lore and remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

cards.Name: Record Player
cards.Body_Text:
Look at This! - Whenever you play a song, chosen character gets -2{s} until the start of your next turn.
Hit Parade - Your characters named Stitch count as having +1 cost to sing songs.

cards.Name: Atlantica - Concert Hall
cards.Body_Text: Underwater Acoustics - Characters count as having +2 cost to sing songs while here.

cards.Name: The Underworld - River Styx
cards.Body_Text: Save a Soul - Whenever a character quests while here, you may pay 3{i} to return a character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Antonio Madrigal - Animal Expert
cards.Flavor_Text: "Once upon a time, there was a casita in the mountains with a very special family. . . ."

cards.Name: Belle - Accomplished Mystic
cards.Flavor_Text: The mixed ink had changed more than just the rose.
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
Enhanced Healing - When you play this character, move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Belle - Untrained Mystic
cards.Flavor_Text: No matter what she tried, Belle couldn't completely heal Beast's wound.
cards.Body_Text: Here Now, Don't Do That - When you play this character, move up to 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Bruno Madrigal - Out of the Shadows
cards.Body_Text: It Was Your Vision - When you play this character, chosen character gains "When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand" this turn.

cards.Name: Bruno Madrigal - Undetected Uncle
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
You Just Have to See It - {e}: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand and gain 3 lore. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

cards.Name: Camilo Madrigal - Prankster
cards.Body_Text:
Many Forms - At the start of your turn, you may choose one:
- This character gets +1{l} this turn.
- This character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)

cards.Name: Dolores Madrigal - Easy Listener
cards.Body_Text: Magical Informant - When you play this character, if an opponent has an exerted character in play, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Elsa - Storm Chaser
cards.Flavor_Text: After Elsa dispersed Ursula's storm, Anna was nowhere to be found.
cards.Body_Text: Tempest - {e}: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Rush this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging. They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Flotsam - Ursula's "Baby"
cards.Flavor_Text: "Now the crown and the trident are mine!" -Ursula
cards.Body_Text:
Quick Escape - When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.
Ominous Pair - Your characters named Jetsam gain "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand."

cards.Name: Flotsam & Jetsam - Entangling Eels
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard 2 cards (You may discard 2 cards to play this on top of one of your characters named Flotsam or Jetsam.)
(This character counts as being named both Flotsam and Jetsam.)

cards.Name: Isabela Madrigal - Golden Child
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Ladies First - During your turn, if no other character has quested this turn, this character gets +3{l}.
Leave it to me - Whenever this character quests, your other characters can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Jetsam - Ursula's "Baby"
cards.Flavor_Text: He snatched the trident from the betrayed glimmer
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)
Ominous Pair - Your characters named Flotsam gain Challenger +2.

cards.Name: Luisa Madrigal - Magically Strong One
cards.Flavor_Text: "This rock? No problem. Go get that prophecy hermana!"
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Magic Broom - Illuminary Keeper
cards.Flavor_Text: Just a few barnacles away from retirement . . .
cards.Body_Text: Nice and Tidy - Whenever you play another character, you may banish this character to draw a card.

cards.Name: Magic Broom - Lively Sweeper
cards.Flavor_Text: Clean like no one's watching.

cards.Name: Magical Maid - Feather Duster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Have you ever seen anything so beautiful?" She asked, marveling at the Amethyst trees.
"No, cherie," Lumiere replied, never taking his eyes off her. "I have not."

cards.Name: Marshmallow - Terrifying Snowman
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You're very strong. Do you work out?"
-Olaf
cards.Body_Text: Behemoth - This character gets +1{s} for each card in your hand.

cards.Name: Mrs. Potts - Enchanted Teapot
cards.Body_Text: It'll Turn Out All Right - When you play this character, if you have a character named Lumiere or Cogsworth in play, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Pepa Madrigal - Weather Maker
cards.Body_Text: It Looks Like rain - When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character. That character can't ready at the start of their next turn unless they're at a location.

cards.Name: Peter Pan - Shadow Finder
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Fly, of Course! - You other characters with Evasive gain Rush.

cards.Name: Pico - Helpful Toucan
cards.Flavor_Text: He spotted a mysterious glow in the mountains nearby. Could it be a missing piece of the prophecy?

cards.Name: Tick-Tock - Ever-Present Pursuer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"That cursed beast liked the taste of me so well he's followed me ever since . . . ."
-Captain Hook
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Ursula - Mad Sea Witch
cards.Flavor_Text: "After her, Flotsam! I can't rule Lorcana without the Hexwell Crown!"
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)

cards.Name: Ursula - Sea Witch Queen
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
Now I am the Ruler! - Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character.
You'll Listen to Me! - Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

cards.Name: Yen Sid - Powerful Sorcerer
cards.Body_Text:
Timely Intervention - When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card.
Arcane Study - While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2{l}.

cards.Name: Poor Unfortunate Souls
cards.Flavor_Text: In pain, in need
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character, Item, or location with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Second Star to the Right
cards.Flavor_Text: Lead us to the land we dream of
cards.Body_Text:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen player draws 5 cards.

cards.Name: Swing Into Action
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gins Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Ursula's Plan
cards.Flavor_Text: "With both the crown and the trident, together we would be unstoppable!"
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses and exerts one of their characters. Those characters can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Mystical Rose
cards.Body_Text: Dispel the Entanglement - Banish this item: Chosen character named Beast gets +2{l} this turn. If you have a character named Belle in play, Move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Rose Lantern
cards.Flavor_Text: The transformed rose made short work of the Beast's wound. But even the gentlest magic comes at a cost.
cards.Body_Text: Mystical Petals - {e}, 2{i}: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Triton's Trident
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Just imagine all this power in the wrong hands . . ."
-Ursula
cards.Body_Text: Symbol of Power - Banish this item: Chosen character gets +1{s} this turn for each card in your hand.

cards.Name: Casa Madrigal - Casita
cards.Body_Text: Our Home - At the start of your turn, if you have a character here gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Ursula's Lair - Eye of the Storm
cards.Body_Text:
Slippery Halls - Whenever a character is banished in a challenge while here, you may return them to your hand.
Seat of Power - Characters named Ursula get +1{l} while here.

cards.Name: Cri-Kee - Lucky Cricket
cards.Flavor_Text: Everyone feels better just knowing he's around.
cards.Body_Text: Spreading Good Fortune - When you play this character, your other characters get +3{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Diablo - Devoted Herald
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard an action card (You may discard an action card to play this on top of one of your characters named Diablo.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Circle Far and Wide - During each opponent's turn, whenever they draw a card while this character is exerted, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Diablo - Maleficent's Spy
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Keep an eye on the sea witch, my pet. Tell me everything."
-Maleficent
cards.Body_Text: Scout Ahead - When you play this character, you may look at each opponent's hand.

cards.Name: Gunther - Interior Designer
cards.Flavor_Text: "I hate to cover this trap door. It really pulls the room together!"
cards.Body_Text: Sad-Eyed Puppy - When this character is challenged and banished, each opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

cards.Name: Gus - Champion of Cheese
cards.Flavor_Text: You can always rely on him when it comes to cheese.

cards.Name: Hades - Double Dealer
cards.Body_Text: Here's the Trade-Off - {e}, Banish one of your other characters: Play a character with the same name as the banished character for free.

cards.Name: HeiHei - Bumbling Rooster
cards.Body_Text: Fatten You Up - When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their inkwell than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Hera - Queen of the Gods
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Protective Goddess - Your characters named Zeus gain Ward.
You're a True Hero - Your characters named Hercules gain Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Jaq - Connoisseur of Climbing
cards.Flavor_Text: Teamwork makes the cheese work.
cards.Body_Text: Sneaky Idea - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Jasmine - Desert Warrior
cards.Body_Text: Cunning Maneuver - When you play this character and whenever she's challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Megara - Captivating Cynic
cards.Flavor_Text: With love, there's always a catch.
cards.Body_Text: Shady Deal - When you play this character, choose and discard a card or banish this character.

cards.Name: Megara - Liberated one
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
People Always Do Crazy Things - Whenever you play a character named Hercules, You may ready this character.

cards.Name: Pain - Immortal Sidekick
cards.Flavor_Text: "We totally took care of that thing you told us to do and definitely did not spend the day in Thebes ticketing chariots and stealing people's laundry."

cards.Name: Panic - Immortal Sidekick
cards.Flavor_Text: "We absolutely took care of that thing, boss. No problems, just great."
cards.Body_Text: Reporting for Duty - While this character is exerted, if you have a character named pain in play, your Villain characters can't be challenged.

cards.Name: Pegasus - Cloud Racer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pegasus.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Hop On! - When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, your characters gain Evasive until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Pegasus - Gift for Hercules
cards.Flavor_Text:
"His name is Pegasus. And he's all yours. . . ."
-Zeus
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Pete - Born to Cheat
cards.Body_Text: I Clobber You! - Whenever this character quests while he has 5{s} or more, return chosen character with 2{s} or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Pete - Rotten Guy
cards.Flavor_Text:
Minnie: "This is an outrage!"
Pete: "No. It's my nefarious plan to steal the throne."

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Vanquisher of Foes
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Philip.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Swift and Sure - When you play this character, banish all opposing damaged characters.

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Warden of the Woods
cards.Flavor_Text: He stands ready to protect his friends from any threat.
cards.Body_Text: Shining Beacon. You other Hero characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: The Fates - Only One Eye
cards.Flavor_Text:
"We know everything."
-Lachesis
cards.Body_Text: All Will Be Seen - When you play this character, look at the top card of each opponent's deck.

cards.Name: The Muses - Proclaimers of Heroes
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
The Gospel Truth - Whenever you play a song, you may return chosen character with 2{s} or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Tor - Florist
cards.Flavor_Text:
They say that his arrangements are exquisite,
His composites and bouquets are so divine.
But when the crowds try to come and visit,
There's always quite a fight to form a line.

cards.Name: Zeus - Mr. Lightning Bolts
cards.Flavor_Text: "Ha! Now watch your old man work!"
cards.Body_Text: Target Practice - Whenever a this character challenges another character, he gets +{s} equal to the {s} of chosen character this turn.

cards.Name: Dodge!
cards.Flavor_Text: "Missed me, you doggone bully!"
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Ward and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Make the Potion
cards.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Banish chosen item.
- Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character

cards.Name: Under the Sea
cards.Flavor_Text: Such wonderful things surround you
cards.Body_Text: Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.) Put all opposing characters with 2{s} or less on the bottom of their player's decks in any order.

cards.Name: Ursula's Trickery
cards.Flavor_Text: "How dare you double-cross me!" Ursula shouted, lunging at the other glimmer.
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't, you draw a card.

cards.Name: We Don't Talk About Bruno
cards.Flavor_Text: Your fate is sealed when your prophecy is read!
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character to their player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

cards.Name: Hidden Inkcaster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"It looks like it's been here forever."
-Flounder
cards.Body_Text:
Fresh Ink - When you play this item, draw a card.
Unexpected treasure - All cards in your hand count as having {n}.

cards.Name: Signed Contract
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I would love to help you, of course, but there's the little matter of the contract . . ."
- Ursula
cards.Body_Text: Fine Print - Whenever an opponent plays a song, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Vision Slab
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Tio Bruno! What's happening to him? We have to help!"
-Mirabel
cards.Body_Text:
Danger Revealed - At the start of your turn, if an opposing character has damage, gain 1 lore.
Trapped! Damage counters can't be removed.

cards.Name: Hidden Cove - Tranquil Haven
cards.Flavor_Text: "Flounder, this is perfect! I can't wait to explore it."
cards.Body_Text: Revitalizing Waters - Characters get +1{s} and +1{w} while here.

cards.Name: Ursula's Garden - Full of the Unfortunate
cards.Body_Text: Abandon Hope - While you have an exerted character here, opposing characters get -1{l}.

cards.Name: Beast - Wounded
cards.Flavor_Text: It wasn't the severity of the wounds but the sickly substance that caused such unbearable pain.
cards.Body_Text: That Hurts!: This character enters play with 4 damage.

cards.Name: Benja - Bold United
cards.Flavor_Text: "We must work together to heal the entangled."

cards.Name: Fa Zhou - Mulan's Father
cards.Flavor_Text: "I am ready to serve the Emperor."
cards.Body_Text:
War Injury: This character can't challenge.
Head of The Household: {e} - Ready chosen character named Mulan. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Flynn Rider - Frenemy
cards.Flavor_Text: "You guys look busy-I'll just keep an eye on this lore for you."
cards.Body_Text: Narrow Advantage: At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more {s} than each opposing character, gain 3 lore.

cards.Name: Goofy - Super Goof
cards.Flavor_Text: Never underestimate the power of a Goof.
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Super Peanut Powers: Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Hercules - Clumsy Kid
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Nice catch, Jerkules."
-Village boy
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Hercules - Daring Demigod
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Khan - Beloved Steed
cards.Flavor_Text: As silent as a shadow and faster than the wind: brave Khan, the mightiest stallion.

cards.Name: Li Shang - General's Son
cards.Flavor_Text: His training was unsurpassed, but it was his courage that would see him through this fight.

cards.Name: Li Shang - Valorous General
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a character card (You may discard a character card to play this on top of one of your characters name Li Shang.)
Lead the Charge: Your characters with 4{s} or more get +1{l}.

cards.Name: Lumiere - Fiery Friend
cards.Flavor_Text: "The invaders are at out gates, mes amis! It's time to show them what we're made of."
cards.Body_Text: Fervent Address: Your other characters get +1{s}.

cards.Name: Mulan - Elite Archer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
Straight Shooter: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3{s} this turn.
Triple Shot: During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

cards.Name: Mulan - Enemy of Entanglement
cards.Flavor_Text: Ursula's messengers fled leaving behind tendrils of dark ink.
cards.Body_Text: Time To Shine: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Mulan - Injured Soldier
cards.Flavor_Text: She'll never give up
cards.Body_Text: Battle Wound - This character enters play with 2 damage.

cards.Name: Namaari - Heir of Fang
cards.Body_Text: Two-Weapon Fighting: During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another  character in a challenge, you may deal the same amount of damage to another chosen character.

cards.Name: Nessus - River guardian
cards.Flavor_Text: He sent the eels away when they came with the sea witch's offer. He didn't need her help making trouble.

cards.Name: Noi - Acrobatic Baby
cards.Flavor_Text: Fortune favors the bold-no matter how small.
cards.Body_Text: Fancy Footwork: Whenever you play an action, this character takes no damage from challenge this turn.

cards.Name: Pegasus - Flying Steed
cards.Flavor_Text:
"He zigs, he zags - what else do ya need?"
-Phil
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Raya - Fierce Protector
cards.Flavor_Text: "You're gonna fight an entire army?"
cards.Body_Text: Don't Cross Me: Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 1 lore for each other damaged character you have in play.

cards.Name: Raya - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
cards.Flavor_Text: "There are too many of them for me. But no for us."
cards.Body_Text: We Have Come Together: When you play this character, ready chosen character of yours at a  location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Sisu - Daring Visitor
cards.Flavor_Text: "Come on - what's the worst that can happen?"
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Bring On The Heat!: When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 1{s} or less.

cards.Name: Sisu - Emboldened Warrior
cards.Flavor_Text: Sometimes the only way to fight the unimaginable is with the incredible.
cards.Body_Text: Surge of Power: This character gets +1{s} for each card in opponents' hands.

cards.Name: Sisu - Empowered Sibling
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.)
I Got This!: When you play this character, banish all opposing characters with 2{s} or less.

cards.Name: Tong - Survivor
cards.Flavor_Text: "I too wish to join the fellowship of Druun butt-kickery."
cards.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must attack each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Tuk Tuk - Lively Partner
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
On a Roll: When you play this character, you may move him and one of your other characters to the same location for free. The other characters get +2{s} this turn.

cards.Name: A Pirate's Life
cards.Flavor_Text:
Give me a career
as a buccaneer
cards.Body_Text:
Sing Together 6 (Any number of you or your teammates' characters with total cost 6 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent loses 2 lore. You gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Be King Undisputed
cards.Flavor_Text: Respected, saluted
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

cards.Name: Brawl
cards.Flavor_Text: There are two ways to leave the Snuggly Duckling - the door or the window.
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen character with 2{s} or less.

cards.Name: Imperial Proclamation
cards.Flavor_Text:
"By order of the Emperor, one man from every family must serve in the Imperial Army."
- Chi Fu
cards.Body_Text: Call To The Front: Whenever one of your characters challenge another character, you may pay 1{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.Name: Medallion Weights
cards.Body_Text: Discipline And Strength: {e}, 2{i} - Chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. Whenever they challenge another character this turn, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: The Plank
cards.Flavor_Text: It's a once-in-a-lifetime view.
cards.Body_Text:
Walk!: 2{i}, Banish this item - Choose one:
 Banish chosen Hero character.
 Ready chosen Villain character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Vitalisphere
cards.Body_Text: Extract of Ruby: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gains Rush and gets +2{s} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Snuggly Duckling - Disreputable Pub
cards.Body_Text: Routine Ruckus: Whenever a character with 3{s} or more challenge another character while here, gain 1 lore. If the challenging character has 6{s} or more, gain 3 lore instead.

cards.Name: Training Grounds - Impossible Pillar
cards.Body_Text: Strength of Mind: 1{i} - Chosen character here gets +1{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Anna - Braving the Storm
cards.Flavor_Text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.
cards.Body_Text: I Was Born Ready: If you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1{l}.

cards.Name: Anna - True-Hearted
cards.Flavor_Text: Make sure you know what's truly important and be willing to fight for it.
cards.Body_Text: Let Me Help You: Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1{l} this turn.

cards.Name: Ariel - Treasure Collector
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
The Girl Who Has Everything: While you have more items in play than each opponent, this character gets +2{l}.

cards.Name: Aurora - Lore Guardian
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
Preserver: Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects.
Royal Inventory: {e} one of your items - Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Aurora - Tranquil Princess
cards.Flavor_Text: Her music fills the Illuminary's gardens with joy and light
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Dang Hu - Talon Chief
cards.Flavor_Text: You can find villainy in the most unexpected places.
cards.Body_Text: You Better Talk Fast: Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Fa Li - Mulan's Mother
cards.Flavor_Text: When far from home, Mulan often thinks of her calming presence.

cards.Name: Flounder - Collector's Companion
cards.Flavor_Text: "Ariel, Ariel! You won't believe what I found!"
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
I'm Not a Guppy: If you have a character named Ariel in play, you may pay 1 {i} less to play this character.

cards.Name: Hades - Meticulous Plotter
cards.Flavor_Text: "This neat little scheme has Ursula's tentacles all over it. That sneaky sea witch... Wait! I can use this. She can keep those obnoxious Illumineers busy while I roll out my own plan."

cards.Name: Hans - Noble Scoundrel
cards.Flavor_Text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula - all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.
cards.Body_Text: Royal Schemes: When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Iduna - Caring Mother
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Come my darling, homeward bound
When all is lost, then all is found."
cards.Body_Text: Enduring Love: When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: John Silver - Terror of the Realm
cards.Flavor_Text: "Strange things be at the edge of the map: sea witches, entangled glimmers, and whatnot. I'll stay with me ship, thank you."

cards.Name: Olaf - Carrot Enthusiast
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.)
Carrots All Around!: Whenever he quests, each of your other characters gets +{s} equal to this character's {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Olaf - Trusting Companion
cards.Flavor_Text: "Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way, he'll be caught in that storm!"
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Pascal - Inquisitive Pet
cards.Flavor_Text: If you want to find something hidden, get someone who's an expert at hiding.
cards.Body_Text: Colorful Tactics: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Gallant Defender
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Best Defense: Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Rapunzel - Appreciative Artist
cards.Flavor_Text: "Pascal! A new flower for the wall!"
cards.Body_Text: Perceptive Partner: While you have a character named Pascal in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Scuttle - Expert on Humans
cards.Flavor_Text: "Wow. This is special. This is very, very unusual."
cards.Body_Text: let Me See: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Sisu - Wise Friend
cards.Flavor_Text: "It may feel impossible, but sometimes, you just have to take the first step, even before you're ready."

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: The Queen - Diviner
cards.Body_Text: Consult the Spellbook: {e} - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Transformed Chef - Castle Stove
cards.Flavor_Text:
"A good, hot meal will set you right as rain."
 - Mrs. Potts
cards.Body_Text: A Culinary Masterpiece: When you play this character, remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Triton - Champion of Atlantica
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.)
Imposing Presence: Opposing characters get -1 {s} for each location you have in play.

cards.Name: Triton - Discerning King
cards.Flavor_Text: "If this is the only way, so be it."
cards.Body_Text: Consign to the Depths: {e}, Banish one of your items - Gain 3 lore.

cards.Name: Triton - Young Prince
cards.Body_Text:
Superior Swimmer: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
Keeper of Atlantica: Whenever one of your locations is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Tuk Tuk - Curious Partner
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Some say he's easily distracted. They're not wrong..."
 - Raya

cards.Name: Dig a Little Deeper
cards.Body_Text:
Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Glean
cards.Flavor_Text: "This could be just the thing I need to get my invention working."
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen item. Its player gains 2 lore.

cards.Name: Seldom All They Seem
cards.Flavor_Text:
I know you
I walked with you once upon a dream
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gets -3 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Treasures Untold
cards.Flavor_Text: How many wonders can one cavern hold?
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 2 item cards from your discard into your hand.

cards.Name: Field of Ice
cards.Body_Text: Icy Defense: Whenever your play a character, they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Great Stone Dragon
cards.Body_Text:
Asleep: This item enters play exerted.
Awaken: {e} - Put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Ice Block
cards.Flavor_Text: Frozen ink can be harvested and processed to many useful ends.
cards.Body_Text: Chilly Labor: {e} - Chosen character gets -1 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Ariel's Grotto - A Secret Place
cards.Body_Text: Treasure Trove: While you have 3 or more items in play, this location gets +2 {l}.

cards.Name: Winter Camp - Medical Tent
cards.Body_Text: Help the Wounded: Whenever a character quests while here, remove up to 2 damage from them. If they're a Hero character, remove up to 4 damage instead.

cards.Name: Aladdin - Brave Rescuer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a location card (You may discard a location card to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
Crashing Though: Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Aladdin - Resolute Swordsman
cards.Flavor_Text: "How about we cut to the part where I make a quick escape and you yell after me? No? Can't say I didn't give you a chance."

cards.Name: Arges - The Cyclops
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Looks like you got some big feelings there, buddy - let's stomp 'em out!"
 -Hades

cards.Name: Ariel - Determined Mermaid
cards.Flavor_Text: Everything she's ever wanted is almost in reach
cards.Body_Text: I Want More: Whenever you play a song, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Ariel - Sonic Warrior
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.)
Amplified Voice: Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2{i} to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Beast - Thick-Skinned
cards.Flavor_Text: He's even tougher than he looks.
cards.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Chi-Fu - Imperial Advisor
cards.Flavor_Text: "You there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor."
cards.Body_Text: Overly Cautious: While this character has no damage, he gets +2{l}.

cards.Name: Chien-Po - Imperial Soldier
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Buccaneer
cards.Flavor_Text: Nobody stands a change against the daring duck of the high seas!
cards.Body_Text: Boarding Party: During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Hercules - Beloved Hero
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges on of your characters must chose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1)

cards.Name: Lefou - Opportunistic Flunky
cards.Body_Text: I Learned From the Best: During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

cards.Name: Li Shang - Imperial Captain
cards.Flavor_Text: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon- the Empire's finest warrior.

cards.Name: Ling - Imperial Soldier
cards.Flavor_Text: A good friend is handy in a fight.
cards.Body_Text: Full of Spirit: Your Hero characters get +1{s}.

cards.Name: Luisa Madrigal - Rock of the Family
cards.Flavor_Text: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.
cards.Body_Text: I'm the Strong One: While you have another character in play, this character gets +2{s}.

cards.Name: Magic Broom - Aerial Cleaner
cards.Flavor_Text: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.
cards.Body_Text: Winged for a Day: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Magic Broom - Brigade Commander
cards.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Army of Brooms: This character gets +2{s} for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Playful Sorcerer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Sweep Away: When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Standard Bearer
cards.Flavor_Text: He set the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.
cards.Body_Text: Stand Strong: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They gain +2{s} while challenging.)

cards.Name: Mulan - Armored Fighter
cards.Flavor_Text: "Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right, so when I looked in a mirror, I'd see someone worthwhile."

cards.Name: Philoctetes - No-Nonsense Instructor
cards.Body_Text:
You Gotta Stay Focused: Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1 (They get +1{s} while challenging)
Shameless Promoter: Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Piglet - Sturdy Swordsman
cards.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Not So Small Anymore: While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

cards.Name: Rajah - Royal Protector
cards.Flavor_Text: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful
cards.Body_Text: Steady Gaze: While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't  challenge this character.

cards.Name: Raya - Unstoppable Force
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
You Gave it Your Best: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Yao - Imperial Soldier
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'm gonna hit you so hard, it'll make your ancestors dizzy."
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s})

cards.Name: Avalanche
cards.Flavor_Text: A little snow never hurt anyone. A big rock however
cards.Body_Text: Deal 1 damage to each opposing character. You may banish chosen location.

cards.Name: I Find 'Em, I Flatten 'Em
cards.Flavor_Text:
I don't ask how hard the work is
Got a rough, indestructible surface
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all items.

cards.Name: One Last Hope
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen, they may also challenge ready character this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: The Mob Song
cards.Body_Text:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

cards.Name: Triton's Decree
cards.Flavor_Text: "Ursula's foul creatures are not welcome in my kingdom!"
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 2 damage to them.

cards.Name: Fortisphere
cards.Body_Text:
Resourceful: When you play this item, you may draw a card.
Extract of Steel: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Imperial Bow
cards.Body_Text: Within Range: {e}, 1{i} - Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging . They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"So help me, I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to the kingdom come!"
 -John Silver
cards.Body_Text: BA-BOOM!: {e}, 2{i}, Discard a card - Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.Name: The Wall - Border Fortress
cards.Body_Text: Protect The Realm: While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

cards.Name: Thebes - The Big Olive
cards.Body_Text: If You Can Make it Here: During your turn, whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here, gain 2 lore.
